skillTree.localised_description: The Blue Scribes are strange beings, for they have no inherent talent to cast magic themselves, and yet are suffused with it, enhancing the Winds with their very beings

Tzeentch created two Daemons, P’tarix and Xirat’p, tasked with learning every spell in existence, and they have spent their lives categorizing and recording every use of magic they have ever encounter
P’tarix scrawls frantically with a quill crafted from a Lord of Change’s pinfeather. Xirat’p reads the written words to check for mistakes; in so doing unleashing the knowledge bound within.

The Blue Scribes’ mission often draws them to battlefields, where the most destructive and powerful magics are used. If threatened, Xirat’p starts reading at random from the accumulated scrolls, trusting to the hand of fate, his master, to protect him from the whims of the battlefield
As they are a most adept and dedicated magic-user, where this one treads, the Winds always blow high and hard.

skillTree.localised_description: Magic flows without and within the Blue Scribes, drawn to pool about their forms and their books, curious and questing

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect increases proportional to the number of friendly units in range
Summons a unit of Blue Horrors

skillTree.localised_description: With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard extends an ebon hand towards the chosen foe, leeching its spirit through tainted sorcery.
An invisible aura of horror surrounds the Wizard’s allies. Only the bravest foes now stand before them.
Harnessing the sickly power of Shyish, the Wizard weakens the foe's will to survive the battle.
Spirits of the departed assail the Wizard’s foes, sapping their resolve and causing dread among their numbers.
Following the fate of the unsmiling warrior, Bjuna, the targets of the caster’s ire will laugh themselves to death.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: A colossal orb of purple-edged darkness materialises - those who do not escape its crystalline touch are doomed for eternity!
The Wizard conjures a boiling ball of magical flame and hurls it at a nearby foe.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: A blazing aura surrounds the Pyromancer's chosen ally, shielding them with protective flame and augmenting their abilities.
The Wizard ensorcels allied weapons, making them burn with a savage fire. The targets of the spell are augmented with superior flaming blades.
A cackling, flaming visage appears before the Wizard. With a gleeful screech, it swirls around the battlefield, immolating anything in its way.
Focusing all his mystical might, the Pyromancer strikes the foe with a flurry of incandescent missiles.
Conjured by a Bright Wizard or Chaos Sorcerer, a column of churning fire erupts from the battlefield, causing much destruction!
Divining auspicious signs, the caster guides the minds of targets, augmenting them with the foresight needed for victory.
The Astromancer seizes the winds of the battlefield, directing them against the foe to batter the targets with unhallowed gales.
The Wizard issues a three word curse, hexing the target unit and blighting their ability to attack and defend.
The caster calls down a mighty ball of lightning and hurls it - should the foe be struck they will surely be shattered!
Reaching to the highest heavens, the Wizard draws a wandering meteorite down upon the battlefield.
Lightning arcs across the battlefield, leaping from foe-to-foe with crackling fury until there are none left within the storm.
Bolts of cleansing energy fly from the Wizard’s hands, searing evil wherever they strike.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard calls upon the beneficent Guardian of Light to protect his allies from harm.
Reaching into the Wind of Hysh, the Wizard draws forth ennobling energies to steady faint hearts - augmenting allies with courage.
The Wizard casts an arcane net, created to hold the Great Deceiver himself. Any caught in its strands will struggle to act.
Creatures of the dark beware, for the Mage casts a ball of pure light to banish enemies of white wizardry.
The Wizard infuses his allies with Light Magic, freeing them from the passage of time and speeding up their actions.
A spray of sizzling silver slivers rain from the sky to impale the caster's enemy.
The enemy target's armour begins to rust, disappearing in clouds of tiny flakes and weakening his defensive abilities.
The Alchemist conjures a gaudy cloak of shimmering scale to improve his allies’ defensive stance.
Blowing on a glimmering golden whistle, the Wizard summons the spirit of Gehenna’s metal hounds to hunt down his prey.
The enemies’ weapons become heavy, cumbersome, and almost impossible to wield in battle.
The Wizard unleashes a hail of magical energy, transmuting his foes into Unliving golden statues.
Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.
The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.localised_description: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.
By speaking Druthandor's name the Wizard is able to heal allies' injuries much faster than by natural means.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.localised_description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

skillTree.localised_description: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.
When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.
The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.
A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.
The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.
The Wizard destroys the foe from within, corroding their minds with doubt and crisis.
With a mighty bellow, the spellcaster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast-spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.
Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: At the spellcaster's command, nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they first appear.
Kadon was able to shift his shape to that of any monster, even a Manticore. One day he found he could not change back...

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.
Death is always just a shot away.
"It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."
"Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"
If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
Master Engineers familiar with defensive formations use their centuries of experience in sieges.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Blue Scribes ride their Disc of Tzeentch through realms eternal and mortal, squabbling as they seek lost fragments of their god to bind them with parchment and ink.
